#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <iostream>
#include <map> 

using namespace std;

#define MAX_LENGTH 100000


int find( long n ){

     if ( n == 1 || n == 2  ){ return true;}
     else {

          long cur = 2, prev = 1;
          long tmp;
          while (  (tmp=cur + prev) < n ){
          
                prev = cur;
                cur = tmp;
          }
     
          if ( tmp == n ) return 1;
          else return 0;
     
     }
        
}  
int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{
    char*  result[]= {"No\n","Yes\n"} ;
    
    int testcase = 0;
    int n;
    scanf( "%d", &testcase );
    
    while ( testcase > 0 ){
          testcase--;
          
          scanf("%d", &n);
          printf("%s",result[find(n)]);
    
    }
 
    return 0;
}
